import '../../index.scss' import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import Axios from 'axios' import MemberCard from '../../components/Member/MemberCard' import MemberNavlist from '../../components/Member/MemberNavlist' import { MdVisibility, MdClear } from 'react-icons/md' import { Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { devUrl } from '../../config' import { DateConvert } from '../../components/Main/DateTimeConverter' import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' function MemberMyCollectionC(props) { const [memlikeclass, setMemberlikeClass] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { Axios.get( `http://localhost:3001/member/get/collection/class/${props.match.params.id}` ) .then((res) => { setMemberlikeClass(res.data) // console.log(memlikeclass) }) .catch((error) => { console.error(error) }) }, []) const deletelike = (Id) => { console.log(Id) console.log(Id[0]) console.log(Id[1]) console.log( `http://localhost:3001/update/classlike?classId=${Id[0]}&member=${Id[1]}` ) Axios.put( `http://localhost:3001/update/classlike?classId=${Id[0]}&member=${Id[1]}`, { member_like: 1, member_id: Id[1], class_is_like: Id[2], }.then((res) => { setMemberlikeClass( memlikeclass.map((val) => { return val.member_id === member_id ? { member_id: val.member_id, member_img: val.member_img, } : val }) ) }) ) alert('取消收藏') console.log(Id) } const UpdateMemberImg = (member_id) => { console.log(member_img) Axios.put('http://localhost:3001/member/update/img', { member_id: member_id, member_img: member_img, }).then((res) => { setMember( member.map((val) => { return val.member_id === member_id ? { member_id: val.member_id, member_img: val.member_img, } : val }) ) }) } return ( <>
